name: qa-practice-site
description: Fullstack app for practicing Playwright + Cucumber with SQL.

scripts.docker:up: (docker inspect local-postgres >/dev/null 2>&1 && docker start local-postgres 2>/dev/null || docker run --name local-postgres -e POSTGRES_USER=app -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=app -e POSTGRES_DB=appdb -p 5432:5432 -v pgdata:/var/lib/postgresql/data -d postgres:16) && (docker inspect local-pgadmin >/dev/null 2>&1 && docker start local-pgadmin 2>/dev/null || docker run --name local-pgadmin -e PGADMIN_DEFAULT_EMAIL=admin@example.com -e PGADMIN_DEFAULT_PASSWORD=admin -p 5050:80 --link local-postgres:postgres -d dpage/pgadmin4:8.13)
scripts.docker:down: docker stop local-pgadmin local-postgres qa-practice-site 2>/dev/null || true && docker rm local-pgadmin local-postgres qa-practice-site 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.docker:restart: docker stop qa-practice-site 2>/dev/null || true && docker rm qa-practice-site 2>/dev/null || true && npm run docker:build && npm run docker:run
scripts.docker:run: npm run docker:up && (docker inspect qa-practice-site >/dev/null 2>&1 && docker start qa-practice-site || docker run --env-file server/.env.docker -p 8081:8080 --link local-postgres:local-postgres --name qa-practice-site qa-practice-site:latest)
scripts.docker:dev: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:run
scripts.dev: npm run docker:up && concurrently -n SERVER,CLIENT -c blue,green "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client"
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.prod: npm run docker:up && npm run build && concurrently -n SERVER,CLIENT -c red,cyan "npm run start:server"
